name: Cubix (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
-"How Much Can You Do With A Simple Shape? How Much Can You Do With one of The Easiest 3D Objects To Put In A Unity Scene? How Much Can You Do With A Depressing Color Palette That Mainly Consists Of Only 4 Colors? How Can A Player Can Use Hes Ears To Locate His Destination Using Only The Wasd/Arrow keys?How Can You Make A Game When You Have No Ideas For One? Can You relese A Serious Game For Once?"

-My Brain When I Came Up With This Game, 2021
